mapper.select: select id, `name`, dynasty from poems_author where `name` like #{pattern} union all select id, `name`, dynasty from poetry_author where `name` like #{pattern}
select t.id, t.name, t.dynasty, count(*) as poem_count from poems_author t left join poems t1 on t.id = t1.author_id where t.id >= #{0} and #{1} > t.id group by t.id,t.name, t.dynasty
